title: having issues with rp
body: i cant buy any rp its been saying to wait 24 before trying this again but i have waited 4 days and still dose not  let me

replies.body:
This happens if you've tried to run a transaction too many times and the lockout period is for security purposes. Note that every **attempt** you make will reset the 24 hour period. I'd recommend setting a timer and waiting just over 24 hours before trying again.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
